The Lost Road and Other Writings

wikitext.*:
'''''or''''' means "above" in both [[Quenya]]<ref name="C">{{UT|Cirion}}</ref> and [[Noldorin]].<ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}} p. 379</ref>

In both languages it is most commonly used as a prefix.

==Examples==
*(Quenya) "...''[[i]] [[Ilúvatar|Eru]] i '''or''' [[ilya|ilyë]] mahalmar eä [[tennoio]]''" = "the One who is '''above''' all thrones for ever"<ref name="C"/>
*(Quenya) ‘’orta-‘’ = “rise”
*(Quenya) ‘’olla‘’ = “over”<ref>{{PE|17}} p. 65</ref>
*(Noldorian) ‘’orchal’’ = “superior / lofty”
*(Noldorian) ‘’ortha-’’ = “to raise-”<ref>{{PE|22}}p. 31</ref>

==Etymology==
*[[Sundocarme|Root]] [[OR#Other versions|ORO]]<ref name=LR/>
